backend/main.mo: Defines actor canister with access control, admin management, client profiles, KYC data, onboarding steps, and storage maps with helper functions.
feature_evidence.json: Contains structured feature evidence for admin management UI behaviors, operator detection logic, and add/remove staff requirements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists short summaries of major frontend files including pages, components, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and OKLCH color tokens for light and dark themes in a minimal Swiss design style.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML bootstrap file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router, authentication and authorization gates, and routes for all major pages.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: Simple screen showing an access denied message with UI card and icon.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Sidebar-based application layout showing navigation, user info, and logout with data from user and admin queries.
frontend/src/components/AuthGate.tsx: Login screen that triggers Internet Identity login and shows loading state.
frontend/src/components/AuthorizationGat: Wraps children with authorization checks, showing loaders or access denied as needed.
frontend/src/components/clients/ClientAc: Parses and displays client activity logs in a table, supporting JSON and legacy formats.
frontend/src/components/clients/ClientId: Aggregates identity documents, KYC history, and risk assessment sections for a client.
frontend/src/components/clients/ClientOv: Shows and optionally edits core client profile fields, mixing real and mock data.
frontend/src/components/clients/CurrentR: Displays current risk level, factors, and dates with option to initiate new screening.
frontend/src/components/clients/Identity: Lists identity documents with status, metadata, expiry indicators, and add button.
frontend/src/components/clients/KycScree: Displays a table of KYC screening records with badges for results and styling based on risk and check outcomes.
frontend/src/components/onboarding/EditO: Dialog form for updating an onboarding card’s stage, status, assignee, and due date, using a mutation to save changes.
frontend/src/components/onboarding/Onboa: Renders a client card showing onboarding status, assignee, and due date, with a button to open the edit dialog.
Builds a six‑column kanban board by normalizing backend pipeline data into stage‑based card columns.
Displays a single kanban column with its title, card count, and list of onboarding client cards.
frontend/src/components/onboarding/onboa: Defines the fixed onboarding stage names and helpers for mapping between stage names and numeric positions.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Dialog prompting new users to submit basic profile info and saving it via mutation.
frontend/src/components/settings/AdminMa: Manages admin users, allowing operators to add or remove admins and view current entries with loading and error states.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the current identity, reinitializing and invalidating queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, loading, login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profiles, authorization, admin management, and dashboard data, using an actor-based backend API.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind layers and theme variables for light and dark modes with global styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/mocks/clientDetailMock.ts: Generates deterministic mock client detail data including identity, KYC info, and alerts.
frontend/src/mocks/clientsListMock.ts: Provides a static list of mock client profiles with Swiss-oriented sample data.
frontend/src/pages/AddClientPage.tsx: Implements a form for creating new clients, saving to backend or fallback local storage.
frontend/src/pages/ClientDetailPage.tsx: Displays detailed client information with editable overview, mock detail data, and merged activity logs.
frontend/src/pages/ClientsPage.tsx: Renders the clients list with search, sorting, and merged backend/local/mock data, and supports navigation to client detail and add-client pages.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Displays dashboard statistics and a list of upcoming KYC review deadlines using backend data.
frontend/src/pages/KYCScreeningPage.tsx: Static page header for managing KYC screening and related checks.
frontend/src/pages/OnboardingPage.tsx: Shows the onboarding pipeline with loading, error handling, and a kanban board view.
frontend/src/pages/ReportsPage.tsx: Static page header for viewing compliance and risk reports.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Settings page that renders admin management configuration options.
frontend/src/utils/clientActivityLog.ts: Provides local storage utilities for loading, appending, and clearing per‑client activity logs.
frontend/src/utils/clientOverrides.ts: Handles loading, saving, and clearing per‑client field overrides in local storage.
frontend/src/utils/clientPdfExport.ts: Generates a structured PDF content string for a client using profile and mock detail data.
frontend/src/utils/format.ts: Utility functions for formatting dates, IDs, statuses, risk labels, and expiry status values.
frontend/src/utils/localClients.ts: Manages local client storage with ID generation, CRUD helpers, and bigint serialization via localStorage.
frontend/src/utils/pdfDownload.ts: Generates a printable HTML blob, injects title/print script, and opens it in a new window for PDF printing.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading URL params, persisting them in sessionStorage, and handling hash‑based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, typography, animations, and layout settings with custom design tokens.
project_state.json: Project‑level metadata outlining CRM scope, architecture notes, UI specs, and current known issues.
